ygData.subject: RE: Re: Crafted Greaves
ygData.msgSnippet: Well, I heard he (Borxx) spawns in the King s Room. I ll be going with (atleast) myself (32 Shaman) plus a druid friend (29 Druid), and will nuke his ass off
ygData.messageBody:
Well, I heard he (Borxx) spawns in the King's Room. I'll be going with
(atleast) myself (32 Shaman) plus a druid friend (29 Druid), and will nuke
his ass off when he spawns if possible. That's assuming someone is camping
the kings room.... If not, well...I'll have to bring some friends. Might
have to pull a higher level friend or two....hrm.... Camping the King's room
could be fun though for a higher level group.

Anyone camped this room before? Know what kind of group it would take to
camp sucessfully and control it? right now, my group has been camping the
King's room in Perma and controling it well ('cept when the pull goes bad
for the higher levelers and 3-5 Ice Giants come charging into the
room.....ouch....*chuckle*).

-----Original Message-----
From: Doug Sorensen [mailto:belgarth_of_surefall@...]
Sent: Monday, September 13, 1999 4:30 PM
To: EQCheats@onelist.com
Subject: RE: [EQCheats] Re: Crafted Greaves


From: Doug Sorensen <belgarth_of_surefall@...>

Borxx spawns in the King room down below. I don't
know what his spawn rate is but I have seen him in
there both times I went to Runnyeye. I went there with
a level 32 Paladin, Level 33 Cleric and myself at
level 26 and we all barely lived. Make sure to have a
strong and/or full group.

Belgarth

--- "Whitcraft,David" <DWHITCRAFT@...> wrote:
> From: "Whitcraft,David" <DWHITCRAFT@...>
>
---- snip ----
>
> Also gonna need to find Borxx, since he drops one of
> the three peices I
> hear. Where does he spawn, and how often?
>
> Thanks again for everyone's assistance in the
> crafted quests!!
